book.page:
I love you.
I wish to hear from you. To sit down and listen to your words like salve on my soul.
And you remain unmoving, still and inscrutible as the Spindle and thrice as wondrous.
I weep, knowing not whether you will have me.
I spend all my water on this grief.
Please, give me a sign.
